channel.title: Campaigns on Champions of Trevail
channel.description: Recent content in Campaigns on Champions of Trevail

item.title: Campaign Summary
item.description: Campaign - Introduction # The Pitch # Adventures of a ragged band, forged together by fate and the brutal world they find themselves in. Grimdark Fantasy, expect hard choices and grey tasks and everything has a price - but this is still fantasy. Truths # Trevail is a land of Upheaval, Broken by the arcane machinations of an age long past - that still grasps at this world in alien ways.

Grimdark Fantasy # Check out these links for More Reading on Grimdark and its place in the Fantasy Spectrum What is Grimdark Beware of Heroes - A Guide to Grimdark Is it Grimdark or is it Horror? Heroic, Realistic, and Grimdark – the Shades of Fantasy
